statements: SELECT * FROM user_reviews;
SELECT brand_name, model_name, rating FROM user_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT review_id, model_name, brand_name FROM user_reviews WHERE brand_name = 'Samsung';
SELECT * FROM user_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT count(review_id) as total_reviews FROM user_reviews WHERE brand_name = 'Apple';
SELECT review_id, brand_name, model_name, rating, review_text FROM user_reviews WHERE brand_name = 'Samsung' AND rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT brand_name, model_name, review_text FROM user_reviews WHERE rating <= 2 ORDER BY review_id ASC
SELECT model_name, rating FROM user_reviews WHERE brand_name = 'Apple' ORDER BY model_name ASC, rating DESC
SELECT * FROM user_reviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM user_reviews
SELECT * FROM user_reviews WHERE id = 1;
SELECT brand, model, rating FROM user_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM bicycle_brands WHERE country_of_origin = 'Italy';
SELECT brand_name, founding_year FROM bicycle_brands WHERE founding_year < 1900;
SELECT id, brand, review_date FROM user_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, brand, model, rating FROM user_reviews WHERE brand='Trek' AND rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT brand, model, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM user_reviews GROUP BY brand, model HAVING AVG(rating) > 3.5 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;

SELECT b.brand_name, b.country_of_origin, COUNT(u.id) AS review_count FROM bicycle_brands b LEFT JOIN user_reviews u ON b.brand_name = u.brand GROUP BY b.brand_name, b.country_of_origin ORDER BY review_count DESC;
SELECT brand, model, review, review_date FROM user_reviews WHERE brand='Giant' AND review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-08-31' ORDER BY review_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM UserReviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, brand_name, model_name, rating FROM UserReviews WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT brand_name, model_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM UserReviews GROUP BY brand_name, model_name;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM UserReviews WHERE brand_name = 'Apple' AND model_name = 'iPhone 12';
SELECT brand_name, COUNT(model_name) AS total_models FROM Models GROUP BY brand_name ORDER BY total_models DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserReviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT brand_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM UserReviews GROUP BY brand_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT brand_name, model_name, review_text FROM UserReviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY brand_name, model_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT brand_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM UserReviews GROUP BY brand_name ORDER BY total_reviews DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.brand_name, m.model_name, u.rating FROM UserReviews u INNER JOIN Models m ON u.brand_name = m.brand_id ORDER BY u.rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT brand_name, brand_id FROM BicycleBrands
SELECT model_name, brand_id FROM BicycleModels WHERE model_id = 1
SELECT user_name, rating FROM Users JOIN UserReviews ON Users.user_id = UserReviews.user_id
SELECT brand_name, model_name, rating FROM BicycleBrands JOIN BicycleModels ON BicycleBrands.brand_id = BicycleModels.brand_id JOIN UserReviews ON BicycleModels.model_id = UserReviews.model_id
SELECT * FROM UserReviews WHERE rating >= 4
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT model_name, brand_name FROM BicycleModels JOIN BicycleBrands ON BicycleModels.brand_id = BicycleBrands.brand_id;
SELECT user_name, review_text, rating FROM Users JOIN UserReviews ON Users.user_id = UserReviews.user_id WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT brand_name, COUNT(model_id) AS total_models FROM BicycleBrands LEFT JOIN BicycleModels ON BicycleBrands.brand_id = BicycleModels.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name;

SELECT brand_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM BicycleBrands JOIN BicycleModels ON BicycleBrands.brand_id = BicycleModels.brand_id JOIN UserReviews ON BicycleModels.model_id = UserReviews.model_id GROUP BY brand_name ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM brand;
SELECT brand_name FROM brand ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT model_name, brand_id FROM model WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT review_id, rating FROM review WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM brand;
SELECT brand_name, model_name FROM brand JOIN model ON brand.brand_id = model.brand_id;
SELECT user.username, review.rating FROM user JOIN review ON user.user_id = review.user_id;
SELECT model.model_name, review.rating, comment.comment_text FROM model JOIN review ON model.model_id = review.model_id JOIN comment ON review.review_id = comment.review_id;
SELECT brand.brand_name, COUNT(model.model_id) AS model_count FROM brand LEFT JOIN model ON brand.brand_id = model.brand_id GROUP BY brand.brand_name;
